revised_title: Sir William Jones: A Great Scholar and His Contributions to Oriental Studies
tldr: This article discusses the bicentenary celebrations of the birth of Sir William Jones, a renowned scholar and founder of the Royal Asiatic Society of Bengal. It highlights his contributions to Oriental studies and his impact on the field of knowledge in India. The article also mentions the Commemorative Volume published by the Royal Asiatic Society of Bengal, which includes addresses, lectures, and essays on Sir William Jones's work and research.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science
